Text.Page:
Strength to you!

This task isn't for the feint of heart, but I can't think of a better for the job. I need someone to go deep into Free Traders territory and show them what we're made of.

In war, any soldier can kill another soldier. I have something bigger in mind: take out their huge beasts, then they'll see the true strength of the Iron Order.

Too many soldiers are all talk and no fight. That was the federation's downfall.

I see you're the kind whose actions speak louder than words.

You've brought honor to the Iron Order!
